document_data.name: Iron Bones
document_data.mainbody: '''''Iron bones''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s, [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell transformed the bones of an [[undead]] creature into [[iron]]. The spell also worked on undead creatures that had an exoskeleton.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[focus]] in the form of a small skull of iron or [[steel]].
